question: Who is the first cricket player to score a double century in the 100th test match?
explanation:
The England Cricket Team Captain Joe Root has become the first cricket player to score a double century in the 100th test match.
Joe Root achieved this feat during the test match against India at Chennai. He scored fifth double century of his career. He also became only the second captain, other than Don Bradman, to hit 150-plus scores in three Test matches in a run.
